Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre

Interface Plan<A extends Action>

Type Parameters:
A - the type of action this plan is made of
All Superinterfaces:
Countable, Iterable<A>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Solution<A>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HeadPlan, SolutionGoal, SolutionPlan, TailPlan
public interface Plan<A extends Action> extends Iterable<A>, Countable
A plan is a sequence of actions.
